scripts.start: yarn run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup -w -c scripts/rollup.config.dev.mjs
scripts.build: yarn run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c scripts/rollup.config.prod.mjs && npm run copy
scripts.copy: cp lib/reva.js example/public/reva.js && cp lib/declarations/index.d.ts example/public/reva.d.ts
